original_text: From the ground unto above the door were cherubims and palm trees made, and on the wall of the temple.
korean_text: 땅에서부터 문 통로 위에까지 그룹들과 종려나무들을 새겼으니 성전 벽이 다 그러하더라

sentences.original_text: From the ground unto above the door
were cherubims and palm trees made
and on the wall of the temple
